import React, { useState } from "react"; const Form = (prop) => { const [empForm, setEmpForm] = useState({ name: "", password: "", email: "", number: "", salary: "", time: "", }); const EmpEvent = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target.value; setEmpForm({ [name]: value }); console.log(empForm); }; console.log(prop.name); return ( <> {prop.formvalue ? (
) : null} ); }; export default Form;
